short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds informative decals to Facebook posts; see README for more details.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds informative decals to Facebook posts with accuracy and bias metrics (based on Media Bias/Fact Check's publicly available data).  These data can be found by clicking on an article's decals or directly at https://mediabiasfactcheck.com/
